tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE network_traffic_monitor (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  source_ip VARCHAR(255),
  destination_ip VARCHAR(255),
  port INT,
  protocol VARCHAR(50),
  threat_level ENUM('low', 'medium', 'high'),
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE network_traffic (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    source_ip VARCHAR(255),
    destination_ip VARCHAR(255),
    protocol VARCHAR(50),
    threat_level INT
);

CREATE TABLE network_traffic (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    source_ip VARCHAR(255),
    destination_ip VARCHAR(255),
    data_size INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE alert_logs (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    alert_type VARCHAR(100),
    alert_message TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    analyst_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE network_devices (
    device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name VARCHAR(50),
    device_type VARCHAR(50),
    ip_address VARCHAR(15),
    location VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE network_traffic_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    log_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    source_ip VARCHAR(15),
    destination_ip VARCHAR(15),
    protocol VARCHAR(20),
    status VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE threat_detection (
    threat_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    log_id INT,
    threat_type VARCHAR(50),
    threat_level INT,
    threat_description VARCHAR(200)
)

CREATE TABLE security_analysts (
    analyst_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    analyst_name VARCHAR(50),
    department VARCHAR(50),
    experience_years INT,
    location VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE threat_alerts (
    alert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    threat_id INT,
    analyst_id INT,
    alert_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    alert_message VARCHAR(200)
)
